title: Is Concord Doomed & Can Astro Bot be GOTY? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.31.24
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off each pair of polarized sunglasses.

Tim and Greg chat about Astro Bot and Concord trailer reception, Metal Gear Solid Delta's possible delay, and Toys For Bob is officially partnering with Xbox.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:08 - Housekeeping
 - Today after KFGD, you’ll get:
     - GAMESCAST is Blessing’s interview with Xalavier Nelson
     - Following that is Game Showdown
     - The STREAM is Fallout 76
 - If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
     - You can get today’s Gregway.
     - And you can also get Kinda Funny Happy Hour this afternoon if you’re at the $25 tier.
              -   The Roper Report   -
00:08:28 - Astro Bot trailer gets 99% likes on YouTube, Concord gets 18% - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:37:03 - Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater might not release until 2025, it’s claimed - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:41:25 - Toys For Bob is officially partnering with Xbox for their next game
00:43:48 - There Are ‘Hours’ Of Official Recordings Of Shadow The Hedgehog Saying ‘F***’ - Kenneth Shepard @ Kotaku
00:47:52 - Panic recovers stolen Playdates worth $400,000 - Chris Kerr @ Game Developer
00:50:08 - Wee News!
00:54:18 - SuperChats
00:57:11 - You‘re Wrong
